simulating.md
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 # simulate an empty world
2 In order to simulate an empty world, source your ROS environment and catkin workspace, and then launch pioneer3dx.launch.
3 
4 ```console
5 foo@bar:~$ source /opt/ros/melodic/setup.bash
6 foo@bar:~$ source /path/to/catkin_ws/devel/setup.bash
7 foo@bar:~$ roslaunch p3x_gazebo pioneer3dx.launch world:=p3dx
8 ```

p3dx_gazebo
